com.ulflander.minethat.model
Class TextLength

java.lang.Object
  com.ulflander.minethat.model.TextLength

public final class TextLength
extends Object

Lenght indicator of a text. TextLength applies to Documents, Chapters, Paragraphs and Sentences. It's based on the number of token in the given text.

Since:
2/23/14
Author:
Ulflander
